alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 12 at 4:03AM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lewis county. The greatest snow amounts will likely focus across the higher terrain of the Tug Hill and western foothills of the Adirondacks. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult with snow covered roads and poor visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Begin needed preparations at home or with your vehicle. Travel may become difficult, so plan accordingly.
